Name: Tier II Shelters, Doubling Up
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the doubling up of families in Tier II shelters.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Title 21 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding a new section 21-310 to read as follows:
	�21-310  Prohibiting the doubling up of families in Tier II shelters.  The city shall not permit the placement of two or more unrelated families in an apartment-style unit of a Tier II shelter, as defined in section 900.2 of title 18 of the official compilation of the codes, rules and regulations of the state of New York.
	�2.	This local law shall take effect immediately.
